# Investigative Mind (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 2]], [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 185

Your mind is able to correlate information effectively. When attempting an [[Appraise (Skill)|Appraise]], [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]], [[Linguistics (PF Freeport Comp)|Linguistics]], or [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] check, you can roll twice and take the higher result. If you have an ability that allows you to roll twice, you cannot use that ability and this benefit on the same roll.

The spell is discharged once you have used its benefit a number of times equal to your caster level.
